rule: Each description must avoid identifying the subjects and omit their characteristics such as appearance, attire, and actions.
input: A scenic view of a mountain range with clear skies.
coverage: A majestic mountain range featuring towering, snow-capped peaks standing prominently under a vast, clear blue sky during the bright midday sun. The rugged terrain is complemented by lush green forests at the base and a sparkling alpine lake that mirrors the surrounding grandeur. Sunlight casts crisp, defined shadows, enhancing the textures of the rocky surfaces and vibrant vegetation. The serene and awe-inspiring atmosphere evokes a sense of tranquility and the sublime beauty of untouched nature, inviting viewers to immerse themselves in the peaceful wilderness.
validityText:
The input is a single English sentence under 80 words and serves as a natural language description suitable for AI-generated photo prompts.
OK
